name: ASCII Mini Golf
description:
My entry for Terminal Jam Reboot.

A small golf game where everything is dynamically rendered in letters describing the color of the particular fragment. It's a rather short and rushed game but I hope you enjoy it : )

Controls: Click to apply force to the ball. Hold click to increase the magnitude of the force. Press R to restart level.

The game was made with my own html/Javascript/Webgl game framework and for the physics I used the matter.js library https://brm.io/matter-js/.
